movie.title: The Marine 2
movie.description_intro: While on vacation, an American Marine sniper takes on local rebels who have seized control of the island hotel resort where he and his wife, who is now a hostage for ransom, have been staying.
movie.description_full: While on vacation, an American Marine sniper takes on local rebels who have seized control of the island hotel resort where he and his wife, who is now a hostage for ransom, have been staying.

movies.title: Club Life
movies.summary: A night club promoter tries to make a name for himself in New York City.
movies.description_full: A night club promoter tries to make a name for himself in New York City.
movies.synopsis: A night club promoter tries to make a name for himself in New York City.

movies.title: #FriendButMarried 2
movies.summary: Not enough satisfied yet in enjoying the moment as a wife, Ayu (Mawar De Jongh) suddenly becomes pregnant. Her personality changes completely. Usually, she has a passion for accompanying her husband Ditto (Adipati Dolken) everywhere, now she becomes lazy and worse: super sensitive. Ditto has to hold back and pretend not to be jealous of the attention Ayu gives to the fetus. The quarrels that often occur make Ayu and Ditto have to choose which one to keep; their marriage or the baby.

movies.title: The Witch
movies.summary: New England, 1630: William and Katherine try to lead a devout Christian life, homesteading on the edge of an impassible wilderness, with five children. When their newborn son mysteriously vanishes and their crops fail, the family begins to turn on one another. 'The Witch' is a chilling portrait of a family unraveling within their own sins, leaving them prey for an inconceivable evil.

movies.title: Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend?
movies.title_english: Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend?
movies.title_long: Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend? (2014)
movies.summary: Bella Thorne (Shake It Up!, Frenemies), Madison Pettis (Lab Rats, Beverly Hills Chihuahua 3) and Ryan Ochoa (Pair of Kings, The Perfect Game) lead an ensemble cast in this spook-tacular adventure with new ghosts, new thrills, and the return of some old friends. Max (Ochoa) only has eyes for Cammy (Thorne), the smart, popular redhead at school. When Max finally scores a date with Cammy on Halloween, Phears, an evil ghost with plans on taking over the world, unleashes his ghouls and things go haywire. With the help of his ghostly pals, Tara and Nicky, can Max thwart Phears' evil plot, help reunite his ghost friends with their long-lost parents and still make his date with Cammy on Halloween? R. L. Stine's Mostly Ghostly: Have You Met My Ghoulfriend? is a frightful family delight.
